reviewText: Unique!  Great acting!  Intense, and it totally held my interest.  I loved the surprise ending.  Incredible script!
A technical tour de force. Must see..You forget after a while that the entire film is one long continuous shot.

Amazing film - apart from the intriguing story and accomplished acting, there is one thing that sets this film apart: IT WAS ALL FILMED IN ONE CAMERA SHOT!!  There are no cuts, no edits (that I can find). Check it out - Amazing!
